text:
NBC News admitted tonight what we've seen across the US: #COVID19 cases stopped falling & are on the rise again. #MondayMood 

We need $2,000 a month #survivalchecks, a national #lockdown, #MedicareForAll & more #vaccine production.

No Trump to blame, Biden. This one's on you. https://t.co/BwyT0oQWDQ
